node.text: The ad is chasing away the targeted audience 😂😂
@negus_harrison 👏👏

Gillette's new ad 'The Best Men Can Be' has received a lot of backlashes from men. What’s your opinion on the ad?
.
#PulseNigeria #toxicmasculinity #GilletteAd
@thegodson_gram everybody is mad that's why
@kc_mvckentribe too mad
Falz talk people get mad , This talk people get mad.... it’s so crazy that people get mad at anything this days.
🔥🔥Wow
No promotion is a bad promotion. I just think it's different
Peeps will hate this ad for the same reason they hate feminism. Instead of them to learn, change and be decent, they'll be hating😌
B E A U T I F U L!!!
This advert is perfect 👏👏👏
Just mixed the good and the bad... Nothing epic here
The advert makes sense abeg👏...Maybe some people should learn from it instead of complaining..these things happens in our society why d backlashes?
Its a lovely ad
@_clara_jack I do. It’s a nice ad. I think for the fact that there’s a backlash (from some people/guys), it’s shows that they hit the nail right on the head.
@ic_ese I think you'll like this
No backlash from me.
Hmmm I don’t see anything wrong here 🤷🏻‍♂️

What's wrong in this. Guilty conscience is what I see. It's just an ad of how "some" men act. Not all men ofcourse. Please learn to see positive notes. This ad is educational. Must we diminish everything. Fine, our voices should be heard but let it be reasonable.
What exactly is wrong with this ad?? Calling us to order is now wrong? 🤦🏾‍♂️🤦🏾‍♂️🤦🏾‍♂️
I no kuku understand the video,someone put me through pls...no insults biko,i no go school😪😪
@nha_oma  too understated.  Subtlety is good for pushing a message, not a product.  Nobody is talking about the product.
@alanbright999 Well I think it's high time industries that rely on capitalism start pushing messages that are not necessarily for profit.
@nha_oma if only it were possible. I doubt any company will be willing to spend money without intent of making a profit. But you are right, we need more messages like this.
Its a great ad for awareness 👍 , awesome message , but as an ad for Shaving kits, its a fail.. An ad is meant to make you want to buy a product .
Wow, Nice. "The boys watching today will be the men of tomorrow." Only idiots will find something wrong with this advert.
Is masculinity a bad thing? If it is then femininity is a bad thing.
So much women here than men. Thanks for your concern and support..🤗🤗
Please help me.... Is touching someone on the shoulder sexual harassment???
How is " be a better man that your kids can look up to" a bad thing
The ad is chasing away the targeted audience 😂😂
